original_text: Then Abimelech and his men went to Thebez. They made their camp around the city to attack it.
korean_text: 아비멜렉이 데베스에 가서 데베스에 맞서 진 치고 그것을 점령하였더니

sentences.original_text: Then Abimelech and his men went to Thebez.
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 아비멜렉과 그의 부하들이 데베스로 갔습니다.

sentences.original_text: They made their camp around the city
